title: wine_Bolney_Wine_Estate_2010_Blanc_de_Blancs_Chardonnay_(England)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 58752.
country: England.
description: Lively, crisp apple notes on the nose immediately signal freshness. The palate follows with equally brisk green apple and citrus notes, mellowed fittingly with a very fine, soft and creamy mousse. This is lithe, dew-fresh and of great purity. It conjures up visions of clear brooks, green meadows and budding elderflower. The crisp green-apple notes echo long and make for a totally refreshing, brisk finish..
designation: Blanc de Blancs.
points: 91.
price: 52.0.
province: England.
